title: AAP has an ally, but Kerala could be a long, lonely trek - The Indian Express
content: AAP has an ally, but Kerala could be a long, lonely trek  The Indian ExpressView Full coverage on Google News
description: The AAP, a party that is in power in Delhi and Punjab, realises that Kerala -- which has a long history of successful political alliances, mainly the CPI(M)-led Left Democratic Front (LDF) and the Congress-led United Democratic Front (UDF) -- could be a different ball game altogether.
